ai-ethics.title: AI and Ethical Challenges
ai-ethics.content:
Artificial intelligence is reshaping society in profound ways.
Ethical considerations like bias, transparency, and accountability are essential.
How do we ensure AI remains beneficial for all?
ai-ethics.author: Dr. Evelyn Reed

replies.name: Alex Chen
replies.text: Totally agree — bias in datasets is a serious issue.

replies.name: Sophia Kim
replies.text: Transparency in AI decisions should be a requirement.

biodiversity.title: Biodiversity
biodiversity.content:
Biodiversity is crucial for ecosystem health.
Conservation efforts are needed to protect endangered species and habitats.
What strategies can we implement to preserve biodiversity?
biodiversity.author: Dr. Evelyn Reed

replies.name: Kim Jong In
replies.text: Totally agree — biodiversity loss is a critical issue.

replies.name: Kim Jun Myeon
replies.text: Governments should enforce stricter regulations on habitat destruction.
